I think the version of Matlab I use (R2006a) should be able to work 
with .=
mexw32 extension for MEX-files instead of .dll, because the 
command "mexex=
t" typed at Matlab prompt answers "mexw32".
But, if I understand, when the =
ck2cti.m called by IdealGasMix runs 
and calls "ctmethods", it appearently =
looks for a ctmethods.dll in 
the directory, instead of ctmethods.mexw32.  =
However, I installed 
the cantera toolbox for Matlab from the windows insta=
ller package 
Cantera-1.7.0.
I also have been advised by a member of the gr=
oup that changing the 
Matlab version to R2006b has solved the problem on h=
is machine.  I 
did not have the opportunity to check it yet, but I'll keep=
 you 
informed.
Thanks again for your ideas,

Barbara
